summary: A shape-shifting snake exacts vengeance on a group of friends for a crime they did not even commit.
cast: Sunny Deol|Arman Kohli|Manisha Koirala|Akshay Kumar|Sonu Nigam|Sunil Shetty|Arshad Warsi|Aftab Shivdasani|Aditya Pancholi|Rambha|Pinky Campbell|Raj Babbar|Kiran Rathod|Sharad S. Kapoor|Rajat Bedi|Johnny Lever|Amrish Puri|Nikita|Atul Agnihotri|Jaspal Bhatti|Dinesh Hingoo|Ali Khan|Shahbaaz Khan|Kiran Kumar|Raju Mavani|Raza Murad|Gavin Packard|Payal|Shamsuddin|Siddharth|Upasna Singh|Aman Verma
director: Director: Rajkumar Kohli (as Raj Kumar Kohli)
title: Jaani Dushman: Ek Anokhi Kahani
